Posts.Content: Asta wrote: Hi Everyone, This may sound odd, but I'm a bit worried! I had a Stage III tumour removed at the beginning of last year, then had chemo and radio, which I finished last August. Over the past month I've noticed quite a few more moles on various parts of my body, of all different shapes and colours. None of them look particularly suspicious, but two of them have bled a little and a couple of them itch. I live in Britain so the weather has only been sunny for a couple of weeks, and I haven't used a tanning booth for about two years. Does anyone know if the radiation can cause extra moles? I've been told that it stays in your body for a long time after treatment. Â Thanks for reading, hugs to everyone! Asta Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Does Radiotherapy Cause Extra Moles? Asta Asta

Posts.Content: Jun 9, 2009 03:43AM Asta wrote: Thanks everyone for your help x I'm seeing the oncologist in two weeks for my check up so will talk to him about it then. Thanks again and good luck to everyone x x
